metadata.title: CVE-2016-8568 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The git_commit_message function in oid.c in libgit2 before 0.24.3 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via acat-file command with a crafted object file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-8568` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgit2-24 - 0.24.1-2ubuntu0.2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libgit2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.24.1-2ubuntu0.2+esm1').
